attributes.name: header
attributes.description: Header text displayed above the child esds-list-item elements

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: If provided the header will include a link to the given href

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size of the list item

attributes.name: selected-indicators
attributes.description: If true, shows selected state on child list items

attributes.name: collapsed
attributes.description: If true, hides child esds-list-item elements

attributes.name: collapsible
attributes.description: If true, enables a visibility toggle for child esds-list-item elements

properties.name: header
properties.description: Header text displayed above the child esds-list-item elements

properties.name: href
properties.description: If provided the header will include a link to the given href

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the list item

properties.name: selectedIndicators
properties.description: If true, shows selected state on child list items

properties.name: collapsed
properties.description: If true, hides child esds-list-item elements

properties.name: collapsible
properties.description: If true, enables a visibility toggle for child esds-list-item elements

slots.description: Default slot, use <esds-list-item> web components as child elements.
